section.p: This class relates two or more persons or things that are subjects of a healthcare activity to each other. For example, samples from multiple bags of chicken feed might be combined ("pooled"), against which tests might be performed.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] subject, where its type is Subject
Points to the Subject (i.e., the "target Subject") to which the "source Subject" (i.e., the Subject that points to this class) is somehow related.

Contains exactly one [1..1] relatedSubjectCategory with data type Code
Indicates how the "subject" is related to the "related subject". Examples include Parent, Child, Replaces, Replaced By, etc.
